text:
I tried to add a header into directory index with HeaderName:

HeaderName header.inc

But the header does not show when I got to the directory.
creator: rolyv@bigpond.com
slive@apache.org
text:
Most likely header.inc does not have a mime-type of text/something as 
required and detailed in the documentation.

In the future, please take configuration quests like this to a
users forum like the users@httpd.apache.org mailing list before
submitting a bug report.
